com.salesforce.androidsdk.rest
Interface RestClient.AuthTokenProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientManager.AccMgrAuthTokenProvider
Enclosing class:
RestClient
public static interface RestClient.AuthTokenProvider

AuthTokenProvider interface. RestClient will call its authTokenProvider to refresh its authToken once it has expired.
